achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.progress: üéâ Congratulations! You've reached level {{level}} ({{details}}) at achievement {{achievement}}!

daily.claimed: You have received $seth **{{reward}}** as your daily reward.
daily.claimedPremium: You have received $seth **{{reward}}** and a $classic Classic Box as your daily reward.

hourly.claimed: You have received $seth **{{reward}}** as your hourly reward.

inventory.title: Inventory
inventory.selectToView: Select a category to view items.

market.listingBuy: Listing - Are you sure you want to buy this?
market.added: Successfully added {{amount}} $itemEmoji {{item}} to the market for $seth {{price}} each
market.title: Market Listings - Page {{page}} ({{current}}/{{total}})
market.bought: You have successfully bought the listing.

sold.title: Listing Sold
sold.description: Your listing detailed below has been sold.
sold.part: Part of your listing detailed below has been sold.

fishing.waiting: You wait for the fish to come...
fishing.appeared: There's a fish on the hook! Click the button with the fish to catch it.
fishing.disappeared: The fish got away. Faster next time!

lumberjacking.cannotFindTree: We couldn't find the tree you were trying to chop down.

produce.produced: You have successfully produced the item. Now you have {{amount}} {{itemTitle}}.

dice.title: Rolling a Dice
dice.description: Choose a die to bet $seth {{amount}} on it
dice.rollingDescription: You bet $seth {{amount}} on $dice and rolling a dice, please wait: $rolling

guess.title: The Guessing Game
guess.win: You entered the guess with a total of $seth {{amount}}, you chose $selection as your guess and you won $seth {{reward}}.
guess.lose: You entered the guess with a total of $seth {{amount}}, you chose $selection as your guess and unfortunately you lost.

luck.success: You have wished $luck {{count}} luck to {{user}} successfully. Now they have $luck {{luck}} luck point.
luck.wishedYourself: You have wished $luck {{count}} luck to yourself. Now you have $luck {{luck}} luck point.

rank.noXP: Before you can rank up, you need to gain some experience points.

partner.upgraded: Your partnership has been upgraded to level {{level}}
partner.upgradedBy: Your partnership has been upgraded by $rose {{amount}} roses.
partner.requestSent: Your partnership request has been sent.
partner.recievedRequest: You have recieved a partnership request from {{user}} ({{tag}}). You can accept it by using the button below.
partner.accepted: Your partnership request to <@{{user}}> ({{tag}}) has been accepted.
partner.declined: You have declined the partnership request from <@{{user}}> ({{tag}}).
partner.infussicientBalance: Your partner storage doesn't have enough balance to complete the transaction.

actions.deposited: You have successfully deposited $seth **{{amount}}** to your partner storage.
actions.withdrew: You have successfully withdrawn $seth **{{amount}}** from your partner storage.

levels.1: Level 1, The `/daily` command allows you to earn extra $seth Coins.
levels.2: Level 2, The `/luck` command allows you to get extra $luck Luck.
levels.3: Level 3, increase your Stall Limit in the market by +2.
levels.4: Level 4, Allows you to use the Affiliate Repository.

partner.left: You have left the partnership with <@{{user}}>.

job.upgraded: You have successfully upgraded your job to $job {{job}}.
job.selected: You have acquired the $job {{job}} profession. Added $tool {{toolName}} to your inventory to use at the beginning. If your item breaks, you can buy a new one from the market.
job.ask: Are you sure you want to choose $job {{job}}? You can't change it later.

register.title: Before Registering
register.description: Before registering, you need to accept the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

chef.title: Chef
chef.sold: You made the food and got $seth {{price}} in return. You can get a new order in 15 minutes.
chef.chairBreakAfter: {{count}} chair will be broken after {{durability}} more orders are delivered.
chef.tableBreakAfter: {{count}} table will be broken after {{durability}} more orders are delivered.

premium.title: About Premium
premium.activeSubscription:
You have an active subscription. It will expire <t:{{time}}:R>.
$progress
premium.benefits:
* Having a Premium role on our support server.
* A doubling of the maximum bet that can be placed on gamble commands.
* Increased chances of winning at gambling.
* Doubling of bank limits.
* Receiving rewards on the hourly command.
* Ability to receive an additional 1x Classical Box in the daily command.
* Increase the number of listings you can have on the market at the same time by +5.
* 2 times more XP gain.

quickSale.selled: You have successfully sold {{amount}} $emoji **{{item}}** for $seth **{{price}}** to the bot.

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.completed: üéâ You have completed the tutorial. You can now use the bot freely.
